description: The Targus 16inch Crave Laptop Backpack is designed to protect up to 16inch widescreen laptops. Inspired by outdoor apparel, the Crave backpack is made of durable weather-resistant material which has been abrasion tested for durability and features a stain-guard coating to protect its surface. Double foam padding lines the laptop compartment to provide an extra layer of cushioning for shock absorbency while the soft, scratchresistant interior lining keeps the laptop free from dust or scratches. Special details of the back panel include mesh fabric which provides air ventilation, a heavily cushioned back panel for added comfort and contoured shoulder straps for ergonomic support. The Crave backpack is a comfortable and durable option for school or travel.
title: Targus Crave Backpack Designed to Protect 16-Inch Laptops TSB158US (Blue)
